name: Retro Space Jumper
description:
Retro Space Jumper is an endless runner in space!

It's inspired by the classic games from when we were young.

Your mission is to travel as far as you can with limited fuel.

There will be fuel stations along the way, but it will cost to be in the right lane to catch them, will you make it?

Will you be able to max your score?

Hope you will have as much fun playing it as we had developing it.

Track types
  • Normal (Green): Good score
  • Unsafe (Yellow): Low score
  • Dangerous (Red): Negative score
  • Fuel stations (Blue): Gives fuel but no score
Controls

Menu controls:

  • Up & Down Arrow-keys: Navigation
  • Enter: Select

In-game controls:

  • Left & Right Arrow-keys: Movement
  • Escape: Pause / Unpause
Platforms

You will need to have Java 8 installed to run this game. You can check if you have it and also download it from java.com

Tested on Windows and Mac. Should run without problems on Linux as well. If not contact us and we look into it.

Feedback

Leave your feedback down in the comments section. Looking forward to hear what you think.
